timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/kube_node_status_condition'
| filter (metric.status != 'false')
| group_by 1m,
    [value_kube_node_status_condition_mean:
       mean(value.kube_node_status_condition)]
| every 1m
| group_by
    [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
     metric.node, metric.condition, metric.status],
    [value_kube_node_status_condition_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_kube_node_status_condition_mean)]

widgets.title: CPU Usage Per Node Per Mode Per CPU (s/s)

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/core_usage_time'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/allocatable_cores'
| group_by 1m, [value_allocatable_cores_mean: mean(value.allocatable_cores)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/used_bytes'
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes'
| group_by 1m, [value_allocatable_bytes_mean: mean(value.allocatable_bytes)]
| every 1m

widgets.title: Available Filesystem Size Per Node Per Device (Bytes)

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node_filesystem_free_bytes'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_node_filesystem_free_bytes_mean:
       mean(value.node_filesystem_free_bytes)]
| every 1m
| group_by
    [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
     resource.node_name, metric.device],
    [value_node_filesystem_free_bytes_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_node_filesystem_free_bytes_mean)]

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_utilization'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_allocatable_utilization_mean: mean(value.allocatable_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/allocatable_utilization'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_allocatable_utilization_mean: mean(value.allocatable_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'
